uploader.title: Upload Video
uploader.description: Video files like MP4, MOV (under 6 seconds)

error.title: Error
error.videoOnly: Only video files can be uploaded.
error.generic: An error occurred while loading the video.

crux.label: Difficult Points (e.g., Deadpoint to specific hold)
crux.description: Detailed descriptions help generate more specific advice. Try to include hold characteristics, body positions, and movements.
crux.placeholder: Example: The transition from the right-hand pinch to the left-hand sloper is difficult. My body swings left, making the next hold unreachable.

errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during analysis
